member_organisations: The Adaptant Group is run by Adaptant Solutions AG in Munich, Germany. Adaptant Solutions AG is responsible for all operations, oversight and management of Adaptant Group companies. Intellectual holdings of the Group are distributed globally, with each region responsible for its own portfolio ownership and management. US IP is managed by Adaptant Holdings USA LLC.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Borders and Security, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- Digital Single Market 
- General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) 
- Network and Information Security (NIS) Directive 
- e-Privacy Directive / Regulation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- Big Data Value Association (BDVA cPPP) 
- European Cyber Security Organisation (ECSO / CyberSecurity cPPP) 
- Networked European Software and Services Initiative (NESSI ETP) 
- Bundesverband Deutsche Startups (BVDS) 
- OSB Alliance – Open Source Business Alliance e.V. (OSBA) 
- Allience for Internet of Things Innovation (AIOTI) 
- Open Connectivity Foundation (OCF)
goals__remit: Adaptant is a software and solutions company focused on the ethical and responsible use of data. Adaptant helps individuals manage and protect their data while enabling businesses to collect and process data in line with their users’ preferences - helping organisations build lasting relationships that go beyond simple compliance.
